tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive package information including tracking numbers, customer details, shipping addresses, and package specifications from the order management system.

order_id.description: Order identifier to retrieve associated packages

tracking_number.description: Specific tracking number for direct package lookup

customer_id.description: Customer identifier to retrieve all their packages

error_messages: No search criteria provided: At least one of order_id, tracking_number, or customer_id must be specified.
Invalid order ID format: Order ID must be alphanumeric and 6-20 characters long.
Tracking number not found: The provided tracking number does not exist in the system.
Customer ID not found: The provided customer ID does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide at least one search parameter (order_id, tracking_number, or customer_id) to retrieve package information. Multiple parameters can be used for more specific searches.
